user_context.user_request: Create a quick mission to inspect the offshore wind turbines in Viana do Castelo
user_context.additional_info: Drones are offline, using base positions as starting points.

target_elements.characteristics: hub_height:80m blade_length: 28m blade_count:3 ground_elevation: sea level 0m tower_diameter:6m rotor_diameter: 56m max_tip_height: 108m min_tip_height: 52m yaw_orientation: 90deg        # heading del rotor 0deg north blade_state: stopped           # rotating | stopped | feathered rotor_speed_rpm: 0             # 0 if blades stopped blade_azimuth_angle: 0deg     # rotor rotation, 0° = blade vertical up blade_pitch_angle: 2deg        # aerodynamic inclination, meaningless for missions

obstacle_elements.name: Experimental Turbine 1
obstacle_elements.characteristics: hub_height:80m blade_length: 28m blade_count:3 ground_elevation: 20m tower_diameter:6m rotor_diameter: 56m max_tip_height: 108m min_tip_height: 52m yaw_orientation: 90deg blade_state: stopped rotor_speed_rpm: 0 blade_azimuth_angle: 0deg blade_pitch_angle: 2deg

mission_requirements.mission_strategy:
1 waypoint per element
- Optimal frontal view
- Distance: Adapted to element size
- Altitude: vertical midpoint of the element
- Yaw pointing to the element's center
